name: D10nne
description:
Description

Play as a girl who's trying to fight through her multiple personality disorder. Every ten seconds, she and her other personality, Dionne will take over each other. Use this to tackle mind-bending puzzles.

Controls

A-D or Right-Left to move.

W, Up, or Space to jump.

Every 10 seconds personalities will shift to each other. Other one will start to follow 3 seconds later.

Submission to Ludum Dare #51
